metas.name: Howl's Moving Castle
metas.description: Similar whimsical fantasy and beautiful animation to Studio Ghibli films they enjoyed.

metas.name: The Secret World of Arrietty
metas.description: Another enchanting Studio Ghibli film with a focus on small magical beings and family themes.

metas.name: Spies in Disguise
metas.description: Features animation, comedy, and adventure with a fun spy theme, similar to Zootopia.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
metas.description: A highly acclaimed animated comedy with a family road trip adventure that's full of humor and heart.

metas.name: Luca
metas.description: A charming animated film about friendship, adventure, and discovering oneself in a beautiful Italian setting.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical with magical realism and strong family themes, similar to Coco.

metas.name: Wish
metas.description: A new animated Disney musical fantasy with a magical kingdom and an adventurous protagonist, echoing themes from Tangled and Brave.

metas.name: Abominable
metas.description: An animated adventure about a girl and a yeti on a journey, filled with wonder and friendship.

metas.name: Shaun the Sheep Movie
metas.description: A hilarious stop-motion comedy with adventure and no dialogue, much like Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
metas.description: Continues the witty, family-friendly adventure with a charming farm setting and extraterrestrial fun.

metas.name: Raya and the Last Dragon
metas.description: An animated action-adventure with a strong female lead and themes of unity and bravery.

metas.name: The Emperor's New Groove
metas.description: A hilarious animated comedy with a fast-paced plot and memorable characters, fitting the comedy preferences.

metas.name: Mulan
metas.description: A classic animated adventure with a brave heroine, inspiring themes, and a touch of humor.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A musical adventure film with a strong protagonist, beautiful animation, and a compelling journey of self-discovery.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: An animated musical adventure with a spirited princess and a New Orleans setting, offering a magical fairytale.

metas.name: Tinkerbell
metas.description: An animated fantasy adventure exploring a hidden world with fairies and exciting quests.

metas.name: Cars
metas.description: A fun animated adventure with anthropomorphic vehicles and themes of friendship and racing.

metas.name: Arthur and the Invisibles
metas.description: A live-action and animated adventure where a boy shrinks down to enter a magical world.

metas.name: The Little Prince
metas.description: A visually stunning animated film that blends traditional animation with CGI, exploring themes of childhood and imagination.

metas.name: A Cat in Paris
metas.description: A stylish animated adventure with a charming feline protagonist and a lighthearted caper.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A delightful family comedy adventure with a beloved talking bear and heartwarming moments.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: A critically acclaimed sequel that's even more charming and funny, continuing the heartwarming adventures.

metas.name: The Illusionist
metas.description: A beautifully animated film with a touch of magic and a heartwarming story about an aging magician.

metas.name: Song of the Sea
metas.description: A visually breathtaking animated fantasy film with Irish folklore and a story about family and mythical creatures.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine
metas.description: A charming animated film about an unlikely friendship between a mouse and a bear, with a lovely artistic style.

metas.name: The Gruffalo
metas.description: A short, sweet animated adaptation of the beloved children's book, perfect for younger viewers.

metas.name: The Gruffalo's Child
metas.description: A delightful follow-up animated short that continues the adventures in the woods.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: An exciting animated adventure with dragons, friendship, and themes of overcoming differences.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: A thrilling sequel that expands on the world and characters, with even more action and emotional depth.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: The epic conclusion to the trilogy, offering a grand adventure and satisfying character arcs.

metas.name: Tinkerbell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
metas.description: A fantasy adventure focusing on friendship and understanding a misunderstood creature.

metas.name: Aladdin
metas.description: A classic Disney animated musical adventure with a beloved genie and a tale of wishes and romance.

metas.name: Mulan II
metas.description: A sequel to Mulan, continuing the adventure with humor and focus on family and relationships.

metas.name: The Sword in the Stone
metas.description: A classic animated adventure with a young Arthur learning magic and destiny from Merlin.

metas.name: Robin Hood
metas.description: An animated Disney film with animal characters, adventure, and a classic tale of fighting for justice.

metas.name: The Rescuers
metas.description: An animated adventure following two mice on a mission to rescue a kidnapped girl.

metas.name: The Rescuers Down Under
metas.description: The sequel takes the heroic mice on an adventure to save a boy and a rare eagle in Australia.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A funny and exciting stop-motion animated adventure about chickens trying to escape their farm.

metas.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
metas.description: Another hilarious stop-motion adventure from the creators of Vengeance Most Fowl, featuring their signature charm.

metas.name: The Wind Rises
metas.description: A visually stunning Studio Ghibli film that, while more mature in theme, is still family-friendly and focuses on dreams and ambition.
